translations: 将……封为圣徒（canonize 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: I don't think there will ever be any problem about canonizing you.
sentences.translation: 我认为，倘若把你封为使徒也说得过去。

sentences.sentence: His secure position in American letters was confirmed recently with the publication of Carver: Collected Stories, a new volume in the canonizing Library of America series.
sentences.translation: 他在美国文学中的地位之稳固，被最近出版的《卡佛小说选集》(Carver： Collected Stories)再次证实。这是经典的美国书库(Library of America)丛书最新的一卷。

sentences.sentence: First we construct a model of 2d true-color IFS fractals, then realize the morphing process by affine transformation corresponding, canonizing, matching and interpolation.
sentences.translation: 首先建立二维真彩ifs分形模型，然后通过仿射变换的对应、规范化、匹配及插值实现了变形过程。
